title: Kip came online
description: Named my AI assistant. Built SOUL.md together. Born Feb 2, 2026.

title: 59 investor emails in one day
description: First big outreach blitz — angels, family offices, Reed Jobs. CRM + Command Center built same day.

title: 210+ email record blitz
description: Big pharma, health influencers (100M+ followers), celebrity foundations, sovereign wealth. Biggest outreach day in HelioFlux history.

title: First investor reply — Yaniv Sneor (MABA)
description: Mid-Atlantic Bio Angels replied to cold outreach. Requested formal application. Convertible note preferred.

title: Hamamatsu meeting completed
description: Call with Alan Pham confirmed and completed. New OPM module opportunity (femtotesla magnetometer). PMT lead time 6-8 weeks.

title: AIDB Clawrchitect application
description: Built a full animated application page in one afternoon. Submitted to AI Daily Brief. "This came from me and my agent Kip."

title: @BonaparteVC launched
description: Napoleon Bonaparte VC parody account live on Twitter. Content calendar + automation running.

title: HelioFlux Science + Press hub live
description: Animated SVG cell visualizations, SciAm + Radiolab press page, all deployed to GitHub Pages.

title: AI image generation working
description: DALL-E gpt-image-1 integrated. Kip owl avatar created. Surprise images flowing.

title: kip-story website launched
description: Full story site about building Kip. Live at kellylucas314-cpu.github.io/kip-story/

title: Napoleon tweet via CDP breakthrough
description: Figured out how to post tweets directly via Chromium CDP when browser relay is blocked. Napoleon is now unblockable.

title: Tomohiro Yoshida — new Hamamatsu contact
description: Second Hamamatsu contact auto-added to CRM from email. Relationship growing.
